text:
Jangid bhai!
Sach mai yaar, humne IITK mai 60% (maybe 70% ?) time share kiya hai, aur courses toh shayad almost saare hi share kare hai, mera humesha ka bulla partner ğŸ˜› First year me humne saath mai almost har exam ke liye last moment mai nightout maara thaa, aur yeh phir all the way through Civil ke courses tak continue raha! Tune apne badminton ke chaapu talent se Ritambhara mai volunteer banwaya thaa, aur phir kya swag mai Rahul tu aur mai queue tod ke sidhe final night mai entry liye thee, although badges bnane pade the but they were fun because of the presence there of you know who ğŸ˜‰ Inti sahi friendship huyi apni ki second year mai roomies hi ban gye. Woh tera har 15 days mai apni table ki position change karna, tera woh "Don't Let Me Down" wala ganda alarm, MOS ke liye library tak jana aur surprise quiz mai kabhi kuch nhi btana, ART mai teri "PUBG" wali drawing ğŸ˜‚ Ajstyle bas PUBG mai badi badi baatein karna jaanta thaa, khelna nahi ğŸ˜‚ Tera cement wali lab ka video viral karna reh gya yaar, kya sahi mix kar rha thaa tu ğŸ˜‚ Girish ka puri D2 ki neend todna "Jangid" kehke, hydro ki saari classes tujhe apni cycle pe le jaana, tera last moment pe aake mere room mai uska project karna. Itni saari acchi memories hai, forever yaad rahengi bro, one of my best friends. Aur haan tera final sem ka MR waala kaand, woh toh prof ne jyada kuch kiya nhi, warna sidhe Tonk aake teri pitai karta ğŸ˜œ Chaapta reh aur apni dosti humesha aesi hi rhe, all the best bro!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Yo Anant bro!
You are one of the calmest guys I've ever seen, I can't even remember the last time I saw you angry. Wing mai koi bhi trip ya outing plan ho rhi ho, tum humesha usey sabse pehle support karte thee, and then sabka enthu aa jata thaa ğŸ˜› Lucknow trip pe tum jo kurta factory dikhane le gye thee, kya hi "factory" thi woh, aur jo "ambience" dikhane entire park ka tumne chakkar lagwaya thaa ğŸ˜‚ Kitne hi outings pe saath gye, tumhare birthday se BBQ ka tradition start kiya thaa, but phir kabhi follow nhi kiya hum bhaiyon ne ğŸ˜‚ Goa trip pe kaafi enjoy kiya, tumne toh especially kuch jyada hi ğŸ˜œ Sorry yaar mai duur khada rhaa, "f*** you Ashutosh" epic and befitting thaa ğŸ˜› Chalte hai next trip pe jald hi, all the best bro!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Ananta bhai!
The most sincere, dedicated and hard working guy of the wing in acads, and still you were always there to fully enjoy and party hard in any event. The way you always were so sorted and focused about your goals was really inspiring. First GBM ka "sir its an earnest request to maintain an academic environment" and "why can't we wear shorts" will forever remain etched in the memories of all of us ğŸ˜œ All the best bro and stay connected!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Yo Anuj bhai!
If I list down my closest buddies in IITK, your name would definitely occupy the podium. First year ki classes mai saath mobile chalana, har exam ke baad "Anuj chaap ke aaya! Nhi Ashutosh chaap ke aaya!" karna ğŸ˜‚ Tera study break lene ke liye mere room mai aake bulla katna. PinkMan ka Forward Assault mai humesha Lucifer ko target karna, PHY103 ke midsem nightout mai tera teaching session, and after exam wing mai tere 69 marks laane ki story pehlana, really yaar "saale 23 aaye" epic reveal thaa ğŸ˜œ LIF ke midesm ke baad toh pattern establish hi ho gya tha, after that tune kabhi mujhe apne room mai nhi padhne diya. Apna har senior se 207 ke baare mai puchna. First year summers to super fun thaa, NYO mai tere room mai saath resume bnane se leke saath mai diff ke liye rona, endless PUBG and movie sessions after those daunting 8 hours (Shubham ko kya ignore kiya thaa Data Mining ki class mai ğŸ˜›) Second year mai bhi apna tune chaapa-tune chaapa wali story continued rahi ESC201 mai. I guess mess ki table pe asking each other "sab padh liya na?" toh shayad constant hi ho gya thaa ğŸ˜› Although our branches were different, it never really like it in the first half, such a memorable period it was.
Second half jyada masti nhi ki saath mai but still bulla session jarur karte the mere room mai, usme Jangid ke woh epic sounds, Raghav ki dating tips speaker pe play karna, ECO201 ko drop kare ya nhi kare ke liye daily debate karna. Also, isn't that secret already out? ğŸ˜œ Final month mai we both were doing different stunts, toh jyada baat nhi ho paayi, but Goa trip kaafi enjoy kari, remember that lonely dark road at night jispe apni akele fatt rhi thi ğŸ˜› Milte hai soon for the next trip. Always stay connected bhai, just like we were right from sharing every moment in the first year courses to sharing scooty rides on the final year Goa trip!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Yo Archit bro!
The guy who always remains calm and composed in every situation. Tere room mai kari meri first daaru party humesha yaad rahegi, kitne maze kiye thee yaar, Anant ke weird moves, Shobhit ki weird photo, Rahul aur mera acting karna, tere room ki ambience, photoshoot tak kiya thaa before starting ğŸ˜› You are one of the most helpful guys of the wing, kabhi mnaa nhi kiya tune no matter whatever be the situation, one of your many great qualities. First year mai tera enthu for the fests alag hi thaa, still remember teri woh MTV star ke saath wali Antaragni pic, kya hi clean shave kar chala gya thaa tu ğŸ˜‚ Political debates mai really kaafi maze aate the, shayad tu hi mera suppport karta tha bas wing mai ğŸ˜› Goa trip pe kuch hi moments saath spend kiye, but they were really fun, especially beach ki masti ğŸ˜‚
Final month mai tune jo meri help kari yaar, and the generosity and care showed by Dadi-Dadaji, kabhi nhi bhulunga, they treated me like family, like their own grandson! Will forever owe this one to you bhai, although maine tujhse apni stay ka real reason jarur chupaya ğŸ˜œ alag hi reaction rha hoga tere face jab tujhe pta chala hoga ğŸ˜›, thanks a lot bhai, really enjoyed two great days cause of you. Chaapu toh tu hai hi, all the best bhai. Stay connected always, and milte hai jaldi hi next trip pe!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Jhunjhun bhai!
I still remember our first introduction jab baapu apne sab bhaiyon ko introduce kraa rhe thee and tu crib kar rha tha ki you have a really long name and form mai fit nhi ho rha ğŸ˜‚ Apne mai hi mast rehke life enjoy karna koi tujhse siikhe. Although tu Bihar se hai, but hai pakka Marwadi, phir chahe woh canteen ka share ho ya YouTube ka ğŸ˜œ Second year ke summer mai financial economics ki class saath jaana teri cycle pe, and woh tera uske end sem mai mujhe dhoka deke back benches pe baith jana aur mujhe first bench pe bhej dena, forever yaad rahega! Tera apne room se exit kar sabse pehle mere room aake "canteen chal rha hai?" or "lunch kiya thaa aaj, order karega?" puchna aur meri afternoon nap todna teri every day to-do list mai hota tha. I think there would've been only a handful of instances jab humne saath mai order na kiya ho. Apni Goa trip mai bhi tera early morning wala "breakfast karne chal" band nhi hua ğŸ˜‚ Tu chill maarna aur negative baatein karna, ek hi time pe dono saath mai effortlessly kar leta hai. r/India thoda kam padha kar, aur crypto ki tips deta raha kar. Chaapta rhe aise hi aur stay connected, and haan, I'm the taller one among us ğŸ˜œ
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Yo Divyansh bro!
First year summers were really fun! Fraud toh alag hi mara thaa, 8 hours kaise bhi karke complete karna, diffs ka pressure saath masti kar bhul jana, apni team ko itna fraud maarke bhi leaderboard ke top pe dekhna ğŸ˜› Your humour and sarcasm is really top notch bro, still remember laughing out loud in KD, such good days they were! Stay connected bhai and all the best!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Girish bhai!
Agar saalon baad bhi kisi ke room mai kari bakchodiyan yaad rahengi, toh woh hai Girish ka room!
Kitne maze kiye bhai saath mai, TA ki lab mai Babu ke saamne saath fraud maarna, GI mai raath bhar bulla kaat ke subah subah sote huye final map bnana, woh Hall-4 ki canteen wali apni walks pe tera humesha kuch na kuch gyan baatna, mess ki table pe apni Modi-Saadhvi par ladaiyan. Tujhse jyada chill and at the same time serious banda nhi dekha, and bura toh tu bhi nha maanta kabhi! HEC and dramatics me itna busy hone ke baad bhi apne Civil Bois ke liye humesha time nikal leta thaa. Tera "Jangid" chilla kar poore D2 ko jaga dena humseha yaad rahega ğŸ˜›
Final month mention kiye bina memoir adhura reh jayega! Itni jyada masti aur bakchodiyan kari tere room mai cooler aur projector chalate huye. Poker and dance night ho chahe life, bollywood, and UPSC pe tera mera aur Jangid ka late night bulla, IPL matches ka excitement ho ya phir "short temper" pe Raju and apna ek dusre ki lena, Mama Mio ki walks ho ya phir memoirs hi projector pe chala dena ğŸ¤£, thanks for all this fun bhai ğŸ˜„, gazab hi masti ki yaar, yeh 1 month humesha yaad rahega. Apni acchi dosti humesha strong bani rahe, milte hai jald hi kisi trip pe, all the best bhai!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Nimish bro!
"Civil Boys" ki jaan hai tu. I can't think of even one deed in Civil in which we weren't teammates! Group projects mai hum sab chill marte thee but end mai tu hamse kaam finish karwa hi leta tha ğŸ˜› Your work ethics and knack about trying out new stuff is really inspiring. I still remember first year ke apne NYO wale days, woh apna saath mai 8 hours ka backlog pura karna. ART mai mera, Aman aur tera saath mai nightout maar ke speaker bja ke collage bnana, and despite mine being a lot worse than you two, still apan sabko same marks milna ğŸ˜‚ And TA202 mai apna Babu ke saamne fraud marna and phir bhi best project award jiitna ğŸ˜ Woh cement and GI ki boring labs ko saath mai funny bnana, tujhe sixth sem mai end-sem se pehle RCC padhana (although kuch fayda nhi hua ğŸ˜œ) And ML ka project, ohh bhai, placement sem mai bhi aapne kaam nikalwa liya humse, aur paper publish ho gya apna, must be the cherry on top of all the projects we did together! Yeh four years saath mai ki bakchodiyan humseha yaad rahengi bro. And haan chaapu toh tu alag hi hai, "civil ke coder guy" ğŸ˜œ GS mai paise chaap ke apni crypto ki losses cover kar lena. Always stay in touch bro, milte hai jald hi!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Yo Raghav bhai!
C6 ka sabse cool banda. Fresher's night ki ragging mai tera "special" march past humesha yaad rahega ğŸ˜œ Tu bhale hi bahar se thoda short tempered ho, but deep down kaafi caring and kind nature ka hai. Poker sessions kaafi enjoy kiye tere saath. Mission Impossible 6 jaane ke liye sab kat rhe the wing mai but tu saath rha ğŸ˜„ Goa trip pe kaafi maze aaye, aur tu driving bohot hi mast karta hai yaar, clubbed with your awesome playlists. Crypto gawd apni coolness se chapta rhe. All the best bro and jald hi chalte hai next trip pe!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Raju bhai!
Tera humesha chill rehne ko kehna aur "jo hoga dekh lenge Ashu" forever yaad rahega. First year ke L20 mai saath bakchodi karne se leke final year ke mere room mai Burger King share karne tak, tu mera bohot hi accha dost rha yaar. You are one of the most humble, down-to-earth, helpful, and chill guy in CSE, which is so rare. And chaapu toh alag hi hai, all four years chill rehke Amazon aur Cohesity ko crack karna koi tujhse siikhe! Although log Maarunga ko pro player kehte hai, but I don't believe that, kyunki tune PUBG mai kabhi nhi chapa else apni team 2nd year ke IITK PUBG tournament se first round mai hi bahar nhi hoti ğŸ˜‚ Last one month saath bakchodiyan kar kaafi mzaa aaya yaar, chahe woh short temper pe debate ho ya warden ko kiya tera projector wala mail, chahe crypto saath start karna ho ya hall ke guest rooms ek saath share karna. Even though teri philosophy weak hai (ğŸ˜œ), but life ko leke teri philosophy solid hai, Cohesity se 1-2 years mai foreign jaake tere romantic sapne jarur poore honge ğŸ˜‚ Always stay connected white dhabbe!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Barwal bhai!
Civil Boys ka sabse coolest banda. Kitne hi Civil ke courses saath mai nikale aur labs mai bakchodiyan kari. Apni woh Hall 4 ki canteen wali walks humesha yaad rahengi, chalte chalte jo gyaan milta thaa, aur tera woh Girish ki kisi na kisi tarike se le le lena ğŸ˜œ TA202 project ka woh video shoot jiske first frame mai apan dono intro de rhe hai mere phone mai abhi tak hai, kya bakchodiyan kari uss lab mai ğŸ˜‚ Drams club aur HEC karte karte acads aur UPSC ki achi prep karna koi tujhse siikhe. Your dedication is really inspiring bro. Apan Civil Boys saath milke bakchodi karte hai jald hi! All the best for your goals bro, stay connected, and haan, IAS banne ke baad bhul mat jana!
author: Ashutosh  Sharma

text:
Yo Umang bhai!
Hum first time orientation ke queue mail mile thee, and we were like "C6 se? Mai bhi. Baapu? Woh bhi same hai?!" First year ka woh tera humesha mere room mai aake bulla katna. Teri "military" wali cycle itna late aayi thi and I used to carry your fat ass on my cycle! Jaane kya soch ke apan aeromodelling club ke orientation mai chale gye thee ğŸ˜‚ I guess sirf apan dono hi serious thee plane bnane mai, and woh OAT rooftop ki scorching garmi mai thermocol ghisne ke baad bhi end mai plane udane nhi mila, all because of that Prashant ki bakchodi ğŸ˜‚ Saath mai dab karna, apna library saath jaana aur wahan senior se rag hona, tera woh epic sone ka posture TA101 ki class mai. Fresher's night ki ragging mai tujhe mila woh epic task, and woh Galaxy mai Nilay ke saamne se saath bhagna, tere saath dekh ke woh mujhe bhi CSE ka samjhta tha aur jaane deta tha ğŸ˜œ First year mai scissors aur bucket mangne se leke final year ki paracetamol tak, I was always your supplier. Goa trip pe kaafi enjoy kiya, tune mujhse beach pe jaane kitne hi photos click kraye, aur tujhe Instagram pe story post karna maine hi sikhaya thaa ğŸ˜› And tune jo woh hmari "Old Goa's Madame Tussauds" museum wali trip lagwayi thi, humseha yaad rahegi, kya soch ke hum chale gye the wahan. Tera woh vlog kab aa rha hai btw? ğŸ˜œ You were always my partner in the eggetarian orders of our group. Poker khelna start karde, crypto se toh kam hi gamble hai usme ğŸ˜› Chaapu toh tu alag hi level ka hai, ICPC gawd. Aese hai chaapta reh, stay connected always, and all the best for your future â¤
author: Ashutosh  Sharma
